title: Christian Cole
text:
Christian Cole is a Sierra Leonean <a href="association%20football">football</a> coach who currently coaches club side <a href="Mighty%20Blackpool%20F.C.">Mighty Blackpool</a>.
Career.
Cole has had four spells in charge of the <a href="Sierra%20Leone%20national%20football%20team">national team</a>.
In January 2011, Minister of Employment, Youth and Sports <a href="Paul%20Kamara">Paul Kamara</a> removed Cole from the managership, replacing him with Swedish coach <a href="Lars-Olof%20Mattsson">Lars-Olof Mattsson</a>. The incident sparked a feud between Kamara's ministry and the SLFA, which preferred Cole.
